description:
As Rito attempts to keep Haruna away from Lala’s gadgets, they accidentally activate one and are warped to another location—naked, of course! Haruko wants to meet Saibai, as she is a fan of his manga. However, deadlines prevent Saibai’s visit, forcing Rito to impersonate him. Unaware that Rito is in the bathroom, Lala and the girls decide to bathe. An unfortunate event finds Rito in front of a group of naked and surprised girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurayami no Naka de Utsuru Mono / Youkoso! Yuuki-ke e / Otomari Kai
The Thing That Surfaces in the Darkness / Welcome to the Yuuki Household! / Slumber Party
À deux dans la pénombre / Bienvenue chez les Yûki / Soirée pyjama
暗闇の中でうつるもの / ようこそ! 結城家へ / お泊り会
